004
005package edu.wpi.first.networktables;
006
007/** NetworkTables publish/subscribe option. */
008public class PubSubOption {
009  private static final int kPeriodic = 1;
010  private static final int kSendAll = 2;
011  private static final int kTopicsOnly = 3;
012  private static final int kPollStorage = 4;
013  private static final int kKeepDuplicates = 5;
014
015  PubSubOption(int type, double value) {
016    m_type = type;
017    m_value = value;
018  }
019
020  /**
021   * How frequently changes will be sent over the network. NetworkTables may send more frequently
022   * than this (e.g. use a combined minimum period for all values) or apply a restricted range to
023   * this value. The default if unspecified (and the immediate flag is false) is 100 ms. This option
024   * and the immediate option override each other.
025   *
026   * @param period time between updates, in seconds
027   * @return option
028   */
029  public static PubSubOption periodic(double period) {
030    return new PubSubOption(kPeriodic, period);
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * If enabled, sends all value changes over the network even if only sent periodically. This
035   * option defaults to disabled.
036   *
037   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
038   * @return option
039   */
040  public static PubSubOption sendAll(boolean enabled) {
041    return new PubSubOption(kSendAll, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * If enabled, no value changes are sent over the network. This option defaults to disabled.
046   *
047   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
048   * @return option
049   */
050  public static PubSubOption topicsOnly(boolean enabled) {
051    return new PubSubOption(kTopicsOnly, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * If enabled, preserves duplicate value changes (rather than ignoring them). This option defaults
056   * to disabled.
057   *
058   * @param enabled True to enable, false to disable
059   * @return option
060   */
061  public static PubSubOption keepDuplicates(boolean enabled) {
062    return new PubSubOption(kKeepDuplicates, enabled ? 1.0 : 0.0);
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Polling storage for subscription. Specifies the maximum number of updates NetworkTables should
067   * store between calls to the subscriber's poll() function. Defaults to 1 if sendAll is false, 20
068   * if sendAll is true.
069   *
070   * @param depth number of entries to save for polling.
071   * @return option
072   */
073  public static PubSubOption pollStorage(int depth) {
074    return new PubSubOption(kPollStorage, depth);
075  }
076
077  final int m_type;
078  final double m_value;
079}
